title: Magic Missile
contents: text | <span style='font-size:10px'> Send a dart of force streaking toward a creature that you can see. It automatically hits and deals 1d4+1 force damage. Send 1 missile per action (max 3). You choose the target for each missile. Combine dmg against same target before applying bonuses or penalties to damage, resistances, weaknesses, and so forth.
text | <span style='font-size:10px'> Heightened (+2) You shoot one additional missile with each action you spend.

title: Mage Armor
contents: property | Duration | until the next daily preparations

text | <span style='font-size:8px'> You ward yourself with shimmering magical energy, gaining a +1 item bonus to AC and a maximum Dex modifier of +5. While wearing mage armor, you use your unarmored proficiency to calculate your AC.
description | <span style='font-size:8px'> Heigt. (4th) | <span style='font-size:8px'>  You gain a +1 item bonus to saving throws.
description | <span style='font-size:8px'> Heightened (6th) | <span style='font-size:8px'>  The item bonus to AC increases to +2, and you gain a +1 item bonus to saving throws.
description | <span style='font-size:8px'> Heightened (8th) | <span style='font-size:8px'>  The item bonus to AC increases to +2, and you gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws.
description | <span style='font-size:8px'> Heightened (10th) | <span style='font-size:8px'>  The item bonus to AC increases to +3, and you gain a +3 item bonus to saving throws.

title: Chilling Spray
contents: text | <span style='font-size:9px'> A cone of icy shards bursts from your hands and coats the targets in a layer of frost. You deal 2d4 cold dmg to creatures in the area; they must each attempt a Reflex save.
bullet | Critical Success Creature is unaffected.
bullet | Success Creature takes half dmg.
bullet | Failure Creature takes full dmg and takes a 5-foot status penalty to its Speed for 2 rounds.
bullet | Critical Failure Creature takes double dmg and a 10-foot status penalty to Speed for 2 rounds.
text | <span style='font-size:8px'> Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d4.

title: Color Spray
contents: text | <span style='font-size:10px'> Swirling colors affect viewers based on their Will saves.
bullet | Critical Success The creature is unaffected.
bullet | Success The creature is dazzled for 1 round.
bullet | Failure The creature is stunned 1, blinded for 1 round, and dazzled for 1 minute.
bullet | Critical Failure The creature is stunned for 1 round and blinded for 1 minute.

title: Horizon Thunder Sphere
contents: property | Casting | [AA] (S, V) to [AAA] (S, V, M)
text | <span style='font-size:8px'> Deals half dmg on a failure (but not a critical failure).

text | Two Rounds If [AAA], you may spend [AAA] on your next turn and whether you hit or miss, the ball of lightning explodes, dealing 2d6 electricity dmg to all other creatures in a 10‑foot emanation around the target (basic Reflex save). And deal 1 electricity dmg to creatures that Grab you or hit you with an unarmed Strike or a non-reach melee weapon.
text | <span style='font-size:8px'> Height. (+1) hit & burst dmg increase by 2d6, skin-spark dmg increases by 1.
